data.eml:eml: Two new species of Willowsia (Collembola: Entomobryidae) from Guizhou Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Yitong (2016): Two new species of Willowsia (Collembola: Entomobryidae) from Guizhou Province, China. Zootaxa 4158 (1): 137-145, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4158.1.9
